attributes.review: This app is the worst. Once I downloaded it, my phone started to over heat. It wasn’t until I opened the app that my phone caught fire! I wasn’t sure if it was a bad battery or what so I tried it on my moms phone. SAME THING! I wasn’t convinced it was the app so I tried it on my dads phone and guess what? It caught fire to. So long story short, don’t download this app or your phone will catch fire!
attributes.title: My phone caught fire!

attributes.review:
when I opened the app there was a pop up saying something sell your dog?! I was so confused how did this app know I have a dog. but, I didn’t really think of it. The next day I went to feed my dog but guess what MY DOG WAS GONE JUST LIKE THAT POOF!! I knew this app was no good. It was spying on me, knows were I live and kidnapped my dog. If you have a dog please don’t download. Even if you don’t have a dog please don’t download. 

TO DONALD TRUMP AKA BUNKER BOY 
WHERE IS MY DOGGGG GIVE ME MY DOG BACK I CANT BELIEVE PEOPLE SUPPORT YOU. YOU DOG STEALING PERSON I HATTTEEE YOUUUUU.
attributes.title: STEALS DOGS

attributes.review: I got this app then curious George popped up. Is this a joke or something?? Does he think because I’m black that I’m a monkey?? Then after that my dog came in the room and started barking at my phone. EVERY SINGLE TIME I opened this app, he went crazy. So did my friends dog!! It wasn’t just mine. There is some sort of simulation going on. They are trying to brainwash our dogs and control them!! Now my dog is broken. Thanks a lot 😒😒
attributes.title: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE

attributes.review: Immediately after I installed this app, my phone literally started having orgasms constantly. Shortly after the orgasms stopped, photos of smoke alarms started to appear in my camera roll. When I went into my calendar, Donald’s nudes were vividly displayed on my screen. Not quite aware of whether it was a croissant or a penis, but that isn’t my business, don’t get this scam of an app. P.S. I am not here from tiktok.🛀🦩🖕🏿🎣🦜🥻✨🤠💕💋
attributes.title: VIRUS!!!

attributes.review: This app has ruined my mental, physical, and spiritual well being. 😪😪I am critical in the ER because of how utterly terrible this app has been to me. 😷🤕🤒It has scarred me for life and I will never see life the same way again.💀💀 I cant believe they would let such an app on App store! 😡😡 People have families and friends that they love and care about, this app completely discards logic morality 😰😰 I hope this warned people, stay safe!!🙏🙏🙏
attributes.title: 🧚‍♀️😭TERRIFYING😭🧚‍♀️

attributes.review:
I am a huge trump supporter aka white supremacist💜💜❤️💛💞💕💕💕💛. however , when this app came out , I changed my mind. this app is so bad omg. It keeps glitching and drained all my battery! I cant believe the president, another fellow white supremacist, let me down like this! I am so disappointed:(  
Anyways, I don’t recommend this app! I hope all my trumptards listen to my advice! 

-Livelovelaughamericasupermom824 ❤️✝️
attributes.title: So disappointed😩💔💔💔💔💔
